SageTVPlugin.Name: Tag Photos
SageTVPlugin.Description: Tag Photos for SageTV 7. Tag photos during a slideshow or screensaver and review them later.
SageTVPlugin.Author: tmiranda
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
Version 0.10:
- Now defaults to 5 pretagged photos instead of 0.
- Added an option to change the number of pretagged photos.
- Added a warning before untagging all photos.
Version 0.01:
- Initial alpha.
